sense.def:
Shame
je neprijeten občutek, ki nas muči, kadar vemo, da smo mi sami ali ljudje, ki so nam blizu, naredili nekaj slabega ali neprijetnega.

seg.quote: The memory fills me with shame.
Simon lowered his face in shame.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
brings shame on someone else
, zaradi njegovih besed ali dejanj ljudje nehajo spoštovati nekoga drugega.

seg.quote: Don't bring shame on the family.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
shames someone
, je vzrok za to, da je nekoga sram.

seg.quote: It shamed him to know that his father had behaved in such a way.

sense.def:
To shame someone into doing something
pomeni nekoga prisiliti, da nekaj naredi, tako da mu zbudimo občutek, da bo sramota zanj, če tistega ne bo naredil.

seg.quote: Father was shamed into helping them.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
a shame
, nam je zaradi tistega žal ali smo zaradi tistega žalostni.

seg.quote: It's a shame he didn't come too.
It's a shame to waste all this food.
